name: Taste of Haste
description:
Speed: It’s a thing that can normally be controlled.

Flowers: They’re so tasty that they might cause one to defy the laws of Physics.

Pure, Unadulterated Chaos: It’s what makes a Subaru, a Subaru.

While that last one may be false, the first two are the only things on the mind of a particular Rabbit. Having consumed every variety of Earth Flower, this Rabbit’s palette is now so complicated that nothing he’s ever known can satiate him. As such, he has yeeted himself all the way to the moon. Rumors of a rare Moon Flower drive this Rabbit forward. 

Play as the Rabbit, and eat ALL THE MOON FLOWERS. Along the way, you will find Spikes, Grappling Hooks, a strange Pink Substance that is very bouncy, and Apples. Sadly, Apples are not strong enough to support the weight of a Rabbit. They will fall if you stand on them.

Controls:

Left and Right, or A and D, to go fast.
Up or W to Jump.
Spacebar to Grapple. 
R to restart level
